name: ITK Cognition
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which is part of a subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK; a set of codes which represent different aspects of personal emotional wellbeing, including mood, behaviour and impaired cognitive functioning. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Cognition' subset with subset original id 7761000000139; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Cognition finding simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset id 999001481000000105.
